alert.note: Alert for Cascade County below 5000ft; Eastern Pondera and Eastern Teton; Judith Basin County and Judith Gap; Little Belt and Highwood Mountains (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued November 05 at 2:32AM MDT until November 05 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...West winds 40 to 50 mph, with gusts up to 75 mph, are expected. Local gusts to 85 mph are possible in wind prone locations near the Little Belt and Highwood Mountains. * WHERE...Little Belt and Highwood Mountains, Cascade County below 5000ft, Eastern Pondera and Eastern Teton and Judith Basin County and Judith Gap. * WHEN...Until 6 PM MDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Isolated power outages are expected. Travel will be very difficult, especially for high profile vehicles or those pulling trailers.
info.instruction: If possible, consider delaying travel during the period of highest winds or finding an alternate route.

area.areaDesc: Cascade County below 5000ft; Eastern Pondera and Eastern Teton; Judith Basin County and Judith Gap; Little Belt and Highwood Mountains
